cs3500.music.view

Interface IView

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AudioView, AudioVisualView, AView, GuiViewFrame, TextView

    public interface IView
    The view interface. Holds all the methods to interact with a view for a sheet of music.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void activateNote(Pitch p) 
      boolean advanceReady() 
      Pitch getPitchAt(int x, int y)
      Gets the Pitch located at the provided x,y coordinates, if possible.
      void initialize()
      Make the view visible.
      boolean isActive()
      Determines if the window is active.
      void refresh()
      Signal to the view to redraw itself.
      void scrollVertical(int direction)
      Scroll the view in the provided direction.
      void setCurrentBeat(int beat)
      Set the view to a certain beat.
      void setKeyListener(java.awt.event.KeyListener keyListener)
      Provide the view with a key listener to allow the program to process key input.
      void setMouseListener(java.awt.event.MouseListener mouseListener)
      Sets the view with a mouse listenr to allow the program to process mouse input.
      void setNotes(java.util.List<PitchSequence> pitches)
      Provide the view with the notes to be displayed.
      void setPlayingMode(PlayingMode mode) 
      void setRepeats(java.util.List<RepeatInstr> repeats)
      Provide the view with the repeats to be enacted on this music.
      void setTempo(int tempo)
      Sets the rate of play for the given view.

    • Method Detail

      • setNotes

        void setNotes(java.util.List<PitchSequence> pitches)
        Provide the view with the notes to be displayed.
        Parameters:
        pitches - the note information for the view

      • setRepeats

        void setRepeats(java.util.List<RepeatInstr> repeats)
        Provide the view with the repeats to be enacted on this music.
        Parameters:
        repeats - the repeats instructions for the view.

      • initialize

        void initialize()
        Make the view visible.

      • setCurrentBeat

        void setCurrentBeat(int beat)
        Set the view to a certain beat.
        Parameters:
        beat - the current beat

      • refresh

        void refresh()
        Signal to the view to redraw itself.

      • setKeyListener

        void setKeyListener(java.awt.event.KeyListener keyListener)
        Provide the view with a key listener to allow the program to process key input.
        Parameters:
        keyListener - the key listener to set

      • setTempo

        void setTempo(int tempo)
        Sets the rate of play for the given view.
        Parameters:
        tempo - the speed at which the view moves through a given piece of music. Units: microseconds per beat

      • isActive

        boolean isActive()
        Determines if the window is active. Allows the controller to close if inactive.
        Returns:
        true if active

      • setMouseListener

        void setMouseListener(java.awt.event.MouseListener mouseListener)
        Sets the view with a mouse listenr to allow the program to process mouse input.
        Parameters:
        mouseListener - the mouse listener to connect

      • scrollVertical

        void scrollVertical(int direction)
        Scroll the view in the provided direction. Not all views may need this functionality.
        Parameters:
        direction - direction to scroll (-1 for up, 1 for down)

      • getPitchAt

        Pitch getPitchAt(int x,
                 int y)
        Gets the Pitch located at the provided x,y coordinates, if possible. Returns null if no pitch is located.
        Parameters:
        x - horizontal position from left
        y - vertical position from top
        Returns:
        the specified pitch

      • advanceReady

        boolean advanceReady()

      • setPlayingMode

        void setPlayingMode(PlayingMode mode)

      • activateNote

        void activateNote(Pitch p)
